snippet: Taking another look at Richard Dawson, whose master-of-disguises role on "Hogan's Heroes" probably made viewers do a double-take when "Family Feud" came on the scene.
abstract: Taking another look at Richard Dawson, whose master-of-disguises role on "Hogan's Heroes" probably made viewers do a double-take when "Family Feud" came on the scene.

headline.main: The Many Masks of Richard Dawson
headline.print_headline: Critic's Notebook: Playing a Role, Even as Himself
